extendedInfo.description: PLEASE, READ CAREFULLY!!!Droideley is an unofficial Mendeley (http://www.mendeley.com) Android client. It is capable of synchronizing with your Mendeley library and of downloading the stored documents. It also provides a filtering options (folder, author, tag) and it can be used for searching in the global Mendeley database or for browsing Mendeley Groups.BETA ONLY!!!Please, be aware that this development release can still contain bugs but let me assure you, that it CAN NOT harm your Mendeley data.I would like to assure you that the development is in progress and any suggestions or bug reports from you side will be highly appreciated.- Synchronizing your whole Mendeley library with your android device- Ability to download files attached to the documents- Browse the library through folders- Filter documents by author or tag- Quick keyword search in the presented lists (document titles, authors, tags etc.)- Share documents through all the sharing options provided by your device- Browse groups and their documents- Download files associated with documents within groups- Search the global Mendeley Web database for new papers (voice search option included)DEVELOPER'S NOTE: Currently, you can experience some problems with the Mendeley authentication phase during the first start of the app. The problem is probably on the side of the Mendeley authentication provider. I was assured that the Mendeley team knows about this issue and that they are looking into it. For the latest news, follow @Droideley on twitter.Finally, if droideley is not working for you or you would like to try something else, I recommend Scholarley (another Mendeley Android client).

reviews.title: Lacking annotation tools
reviews.comment: The best Mendeley app available, but it lacks annotation tools. So, no adding comments or highlighting texts with Droideley! That is what makes Mendeley so useful to me and lacking these annotation tools makes this app close to useless.  Developers: please add the functions of adding (searchable) comments and highlight text that sync, then I\'ll definitely give Droideley 5 stars!

reviews.title: I hope for improvement
reviews.comment: I give this two stars for merely existing.  I love Mendeley for PC/Laptop.  I am in a PhD program and Mendeley is my lifeline.  As expected, the android Beta version is greatly trimmed down.  It looks like the apple version is more like what we need for Android.  My suggestions, or pleading, are the following:  1. Create a user interface similar to the PC or Apple version 2. Allow us to reference the PDF\'s contained on our android devices, same as PC  3. Allow us to sync our tablets and PCs with your cloud so that all are in harmony 4. Allow for notations and highlighting on tablets that syncs with other devices  In other words, make the android version more like the PC version.  I will always be a fan.   Cheers

reviews.title: good start - needs work
reviews.comment: Having my library with me on my tablet is simply great. This beta version fulfils this basic requirement, but  there is plenty that can obviously still be done. From my point of view the following would turn this from a good start to a great tool: -1-> significantly speed up sync/download all library pdf\'s (and no, this isn\'t a network bandwidth issue...) -2-> ability to sync annotated pdfs back to the mendeley server (i.e. notes made on tablet would sync): at the moment, you have to make a local copy of the pdf if you want to  -3-> have some way of seeing the simple, but nice, things from the desktop version: order by date added, recently added, and own publications
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Particularly great on eInk devices
reviews.comment: I\'ve only just started using this (on a rooted Nook Simple Touch), but it\'s been great so far. The interface is a bit simplistic perhaps, but that\'s perfect for an eInk display, and doesn\'t hurt LCD users either. Of course being able to add notes/tags/whatever would be nice, but the ability to pull PDFs to reference quickly on-the-go is the main feature, and this app delivers.

I am looking forward to giving you 5 stars.
